description:
Unofficial Warp Client

Oblivion provides secure, optimized internet access through a user-friendly Windows/Mac/Linux app using cloudflare warp technology
- Added ability to connect from systemTray and improved accessibility
- Provided auto-connect option when the program starts
- Added support for Linux Gnome and KDE environments (thanks to @khodedawsh)
- Improved program window closing and minimizing process
- Implemented new structure for different languages (thanks to @GhostByeBye)
- Added context menu for some inputs
- Fixed the issue with setting the blacklist in the Psiphon method
- Fixed the issue of getting stuck on the "retrieving data" status
- Improving the proxy setup process on MacOS (thanks to @gdariushahmadi)
- Increasing the number of suggested endpoints
- Fixed some minor bugs
